title: Linked Reference Visual Library 1.3 All topics unlocked
description:
Cracked by regitra - ALL topics are now unlocked. JB required.

Enjoy and support the developers if you like this app!


From Itunes:
Description
This is more than your simple dictionary, vocabulary, encyclopedia or thesaurus! This is not a wikipedia ;), not wikinodes nor wikilinks, and not pearltrees!

Improve your education by browsing our HUGE LIBRARY of VISUALIZED KNOWLEDGE GRAPHS of COGNITIVE SEMANTIC TOPIC MAPS to learn and improve upon:

ASTRONOMY, BIOCHEMISTRY, BIOLOGY, BUSINESS, CHEMISTRY, CIA, COMPUTER, COMMUNICATION, CULTURE, DISEASES, DISORDERS, EATING, ECOLOGY, ELECTRONICS, ENGINEERING, ENTERTAINMENT, FINANCE, FIRST AID, HEALTH, HUMAN RESOURCES, INFORMATICS, LINGUISTICS, MANAGEMENT, MECHANICS, MEDICINE, MUSIC, NANOTECHNOLOGIES, NATURE, NETWORKS, SOCIAL, SOFTWARE, SPORTS, ROBOTICS, TECHNOLOGY, VITAMINS and many others.

Always up to date - the database is updated regularly, updates are always free of charge. New quality content and materials are pushed dynamically to your app!!! Each typical topic includes over 1000 graphical illustrations, and over 500,000 word entries covering selection of numerous items. No advertisements or annoying mini games! 


Translate to your language**! Learning is simple now! 

RE: THINK! All information is linked via topics maps, just like your mind does! Visualize the Moon related to The Earth as satellite, not as section in page 872 in your astronomy book!

RE: ASSURE! Assure and improve your knowledge! Look for related articles via attached nodes. 

RE: STORE! Tap any node of information and it will expand to give you more information. No learning curve required, Very intuitive and very natural interface. As they say a child could use it! Drag and spin the fluid display of knowledge!

RE: LOOK! Look at all knowledge as a whole, or shift into exploring a specific semantic tree mode. No more books!

RE: CREATE! Search, create and share with Facebook! Use Twitter to tell the world, email your friends, or customize to add more services! All in one place for your convenience.

RE: LEARN! ReCredible is great for schools and universities! Explore a wide selection of carefully selected topics, searching and browsing to find an exact information via visual semantic links. 

RE: MEMBER! Find the information and improve your memory with ReCredible topic maps!

RE: DISCOVER! Find new information! Expand your knowledge! Use ReCredible!


Please send all feedback and suggestions to <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="9ff6f1f9f0dfedfafcedfafbf6fdf3fab1fcf0f2b1">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

Along with our wide selection of free topics, we are happily introducing a 7 day, automatic, auto-renewable subscription of ALL premium content, for a REDUCED small fee of 0.99 USD, 0.99 CAD, 0.89 EUR, 0.69 GBP, 85 YEN, 0.99 AUD*;


*Please note that due to apple store regulations this subscription is auto-renewable and youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re responsible for canceling it yourself. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

** The following languages are supported: Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Maltese, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish.
